Text: Why is it 876MB? The release is 674MB according to rlslog.

rlslog shows packed files size. because they use "file hosting" and there for all files are packed.

packed = smaller
unpacked = bigger

Works flawlessly, simple instructions. Can't believe such a good game is so small file size. This is like a cross between CIV V and Warcraft. VERY fun!

Thank you HeroMaster!
Can someone pls tell me how to play this game in basic terms once downloaded.
stewman8888 - There's this CRAZY (little) thing called "google", you should really check it out.

Anyone have suggestions for why it won't start up? I just get the logo and nothing happens. I did everything in the instructions and I'm not foreign to pirate bay so I already knew what to do, but it isn't working on this one. thanks!

hmm, the game seems to work ok and loads up and everything but when the actual game proper starts my map is all whited out and strange...any ideas?

I have same problem when game stuck at logo. I solved problem when i downloaded latest directx for this game. 

http://www.guide4games.com/index.php/fixes/1855-warlock-master-of-arcane-pc-crashes-crash-to-desktop-ctd-steam-issues-low-fps-freezes-errors-and-fixes#h4-download-latest-directx-for-warlock-master-of-arcane

I also got stuck at the logo after installing all the 3 runtime packages (Windows 7 64).
A reboot helped, although the runtime installers didn't mentioned any need for a reboot. Now it runs.
